Text saved: Because of what we found, we suggest that Girox Foods starts using a way of managing people that focuses more on them. To do this, we should look into giving our employees working hours that can change, and we should also think about how we can allow them to work from places they choose. Managers need to think about different ways to give our employees interesting tasks, and they should also give more positive feedback and show that they value the work our employees do. Spending more money on training for their jobs, mainly for talking to other people and understanding different cultures, could also help to create a good place for employees to do their best work.
